subject: Running
Marathon Running
Ultramarathon Running
Mountains
Mountaineering
lead_paragraph: In the Mont Blanc 80 KM race, runners covered 50 miles. They also climbed 20,000 feet in the process. Welcome to the extreme sport of skyrunning.
